_description: Valid lead data for happy path testing - Module 01
_usage: Use these for TC-HP-001, TC-HP-002, TC-HP-003 tests
_safety: All data is completely fictional - safe for testing

complete_lead.name: Alice Anderson
complete_lead.message: I'm interested in scheduling a consultation next week.
complete_lead.notes: High-quality lead with all fields populated

minimal_lead.name: Bob Builder
minimal_lead.notes: Only required fields - phone format will be normalized

curl_examples.complete_lead_curl: curl -X POST YOUR-WEBHOOK-URL -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"name": "Alice Anderson", "email": "alice.anderson.test@example.com", "phone": "+15551234001", "source": "website", "message": "I'm interested in scheduling a consultation next week.", "utm_source": "google", "utm_medium": "cpc", "utm_campaign": "spring_2025"}'
